author: Katie Nicholson,Jason Ho,Andrea Bellemare
title: No, you can't make an N95 mask out of a bra
description: You can't make an N95 mask out of a bra, and gargling with salt water will not protect you from getting COVID-19. Here are five myths about the virus circulating online and some tips on how to spot bad advice.
content:
No, drinking hot lemon water, breathing in steam and gargling with salt water will not protect you from getting COVID-19.
These are just some of the many misleading and false claims about remedies or ways to prevent infection that have been shared to million… [+7863 chars]
